text:
I'm still thinking about two suggestions:
(1) Implementing an active option. I.e. you "summon" it deliberately if someone thinks the thread may be worthwhile
(2) Only threads of a certain length are considered by default. E.g. after 5-10 answers the bot jumps in and asks because this is likely to be an interesting topic

elements.text:
I'm still thinking about two suggestions:
(1) Implementing an active option. I.e. you "summon" it deliberately if someone thinks the thread may be worthwhile
(2) Only threads of a certain length are considered by default. E.g. after 5-10 answers the bot jumps in and asks because this is likely to be an interesting topic

text: These two do not have to be exclusive? The second one could easily miss relevant questions that received a well written answer as the first reply

elements.text: These two do not have to be exclusive? The second one could easily miss relevant questions that received a well written answer as the first reply

text: I didn't mean those to be, quite the opposite actually
